overview:
Shaun Pope is a New Media strategist with more than 12 years of experience conceiving, developing and executing digital media solutions and integrated advertising campaigns for top national brands. As a Business Development Executive at Endavo Media, Shaun has a deep understanding of social media techniques, viral/word-of-mouth strategies and multimedia development.

You can find Shaun on LinkedIn at www.linkedin.com/in/spope or follow him on Twitter at twitter.com/shaunpope.
